page.title: 13RECREATION-WYESHAM
page.content: {PLAYGROUND GAMES {HERE COMES THE DUKE A'RIDING The Duke comes up to the rest and says "Here comes a Duke a-riding, riding, riding. Here comes a Duke a-riding in Bombay".Then the rest say "Who are you going to marry, marry, marry? Who are you going to marry in Bombay?" Then the Duke says "I'm going to marry white socks or black shoes or something like that". Then the rest say "Who do you think is white socks?" or whatever it is and the Duke eventually says the name of the person.They have to run to a certain place before the Duke catches them. If they are caught, they join the Duke. {TRAFFIC LIGHTS FIVE SQUARES {CRASH BANG BOOMERANG
